price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߘߊ߰ߡߎ߲ ߣߊߞߐ ߕߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߗߍ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߕߏ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߞߘߊߎ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
